summary: Minimaps don't work because they use the Cloudmade render

comments.content:
All the samples use a minimap that uses the Cloudmade render.
The Cloudmade renderer doesn't work - see issue 28.
The samples should use the default renderer for the minimap (or the same 
renderer as the main map).

The title is no longer accurate, but the issue in the last sentence of the description 
still applies.
This issue is not accurate - submitted issue 69 instead.
